name: Coloring Book··
description:
Color to relax in the best new coloring book app, Pixel Art!

Features of Pixel Art:
- Challenge yourself to hundreds of interesting pictures
- Take pictures with your camera and color them in
- Tap to color each square or hold and swipe many squares
- Use the bomb to color a huge section of the picture
- Use the wand to color in an entire number

Play Pixel Art every day to stay sharp and flex your creative muscle!
